pomodoro.title: What is Pomodoro?
pomodoro.description: Pomodoro is a simple time management method that helps you work and study efficiently by breaking work into 25-minute sessions called a Pomodoro. In each session, you focus completely on a single task. Then, take a 5-minute break to relax and recharge.

step1.title: Choose task & set timer
step1.description: Choose a task to do and set a 25-minute timer to start the Pomodoro session.

step2.title: Focus on work
step2.description: Focus on work until the timer rings, without interruption.

step3.title: Short break
step3.description: Take a 5-minute break, you can stand up and move lightly or relax your mind.

step4.title: Repeat & long break
step4.description: Repeat the cycle. After 4 Pomodoro sessions, take a longer break of about 15-30 minutes.

benefits.title: Why use Pomodoro?
list: Avoid being overwhelmed when working long hours
Easy to measure and manage work progress
Suitable for those who are easily distracted
Helps maintain energy and work efficiency in the long run
benefits.tip: üí° Tip: You can completely adjust work and rest time to suit yourself, as long as you keep the principle of "breaking time into small chunks to focus and rest regularly."

faq.title: Common
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the Study Bro ecosystem

q1.question: What is the science behind this technique?
q1.answer: The Pomodoro Technique leverages fixed time intervals (typically 25 minutes) to instill a sense of urgency and maintain high cognitive performance, utilizing scheduled breaks to prevent mental fatigue.

q2.question: Is the platform free to use?
q2.answer: Yes. The full suite is free: Pomodoro timer with task linking, Bro Chat AI, mini games, leaderboard, focus mode, history, and analytics. A Professional tier may launch later for power users.

q3.question: Can I tailor the workflow to my needs?
q3.answer: Absolutely. You have full control over session durations, break intervals, and long break frequencies to perfectly match your personal circadian rhythm and work style.

q4.question: Is offline usage supported?
q4.answer: Yes. The essential timer and task functions operate locally. Data synchronization occurs automatically once a secure connection is re-established.

q5.question: How is my data secured?
q5.answer: We adhere to strict privacy standards. Your productivity data is encrypted and stored securely. You retain full ownership and can export or delete your data at any time.

q6.question: Platform compatibility?
q6.answer: Study Bro is a progressive web application optimized for all modern browsers across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Native applications are in development.
